Articles.Content:
My face every day I login to steam and see something updated:

http://www.planetcalypsoforum.com/gallery/files/1/4/5/3/0/rainbow_puke_2.jpg

And then after I see that it wasn't Kerbal:

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yvk4w63uKDM/T_68BunMetI/AAAAAAAAA00/-I2WNMvH6lA/s320/Cute+face.jpg

Edited October 15, 2013 by shadowsutekh
Don't do this please.
You puke rainbow vomit all over your computer because of Steam updates? Just another reason not to use Steam.

-Snip-

Pfft. Amateur. MY vomit is rocket exhaust.

Edited October 15, 2013 by shadowsutekh
Speaking of the impending update - no KSP weekly out this week. Possibly waiting to coincide with the release of 0.22?

Speaking of the impending update - no KSP weekly out this week. Possibly waiting to coincide with the release of 0.22?

it usually comes out later in the day

it usually comes out later in the day

*sigh* I CAN DREAM CAN'T I!?
well the ksp weekly is usually out by now, so dream on.
Then dream on I shall!

Actually, KSP Weekly goes out in about 2 hours for me

So stop dreaming.

You puke rainbow vomit all over your computer because of Steam updates? Just another reason not to use Steam.

No, he puked rainbow vomit all over his computer because he thought that Kerbal Space Program was updating. The final part of your post could've been left out completely, as it was entirely irrelevant.

I have the same feeling whenever an addon for another game I play gets an update that is just a bugfix.

Yea just noticed this. Normally it is published around the time I go to bed... which was 30 minutes ago.

But I don't expect it to be released that early, they just entered the experimentals. Would be cool though (although I don't have time to play it XD).

Actually, KSP Weekly goes out in about 2 hours for me

So stop dreaming.

So many conflicting dreams...

My face when steam updates: http://i.imgur.com/e0WX8Z1m.jpg My face when I see it's not KSP: http://i.imgur.com/e0WX8Z1m.jpg

My face when I see KSP finally does update: http://i.imgur.com/e0WX8Z1m.jpg

My face when I update KSP and finally get subassemblies: http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn77/Whackjob_photos/happy-weird-cat2.jpg

Edited October 15, 2013 by Whackjob
Don't that again please

Speaking of the impending update - no KSP weekly out this week. Possibly waiting to coincide with the release of 0.22?

More likely because they fire the guy who normally does them and the new guy's still learning.
Wow, Whackjob. Didn't know that you had so many faces

You puke rainbow vomit all over your computer because of Steam updates? Just another reason not to use Steam.

no, I get that excited because .22 is coming soon, and I keep hoping that this will be it. Unless I'm waiting for something, I mostly ignore steam updates...

And why not use steam? I've NEVER had a problem with them in the nearly 8 year's Ive used them. I've even found some games I would have NEVER seen or known about if it wasn't for Steam (including Kerbal).

More likely because they fire the guy who normally does them and the new guy's still learning.

Ninja'd by other dream crushers

More likely because they fire the guy who normally does them and the new guy's still learning.

I dunno...they managed one last week after they had changed staff...
Whackjob, that is an epic beard you've got there. Well done.

This belongs in the space lounge, not general discussion. Moved.

Upon further consultation with moderators, this falls under the reaction images section of the forum rules Please avoid posting memes in the future. We aren't reddit.

Edited October 15, 2013 by shadowsutekh
